stateDiagram

state Attack {

        Retreat

        Retreat : Retreat

        ShootPlayer

        ShootPlayer : ShootPlayer

        TakeCover

        TakeCover : TakeCover

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

state Patrolling {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as Patrolling.(InitialState)

        PlayerIdle

        PlayerIdle : PlayerIdle

        Patrol

        Patrol : Patrol

        Wander

        Wander : Wander

}

Attack --> Patrolling : PlayerLeft

Retreat --> TakeCover : FoundAnotherHiding

ShootPlayer --> TakeCover : MoreThan5Seconds

TakeCover --> ShootPlayer : E3

TakeCover --> Retreat : E4

ROOT.(InitialState) --> Patrolling

Patrolling --> TakeCover : BeingShot

Patrolling.(InitialState) --> PlayerIdle

PlayerIdle --> Wander : ETwo

PlayerIdle --> Patrol : EOne

Patrol --> Wander : ETwo

Patrol --> PlayerIdle : ETwo

Wander --> Patrol : EOne

Wander --> PlayerIdle : ETwo
Events
settings
